Class
Description
Bow
 
Crab
Crabs have eight legs and two claws, varying in size depending on the species, two eyes and a carapace.
Diogene
A odd person in a barrel
Entity
An abstract class representing all the characters in the world except the hero
Exit
Class exit : allows the Locations to switch from one to another.
ExitWithCode
Class ExitWIthCode : an exit locked with a code
ExitWithLock
Class ExitWithLock : Extends Exit and adds a lock to the exits
Fighter
An abstract class representing all the characters that can attack
Flute
 
Game
The main game

A NPC who can heal the hero
HealthPotion
 
Hero
Principal player of the history
Inventory
The inventory is a kind of bag, which can contain a certain number of items and interact with
Item

Class Location : represents a map in the game
MagicWand

The main quest of the game

NPC
An abstract class representing all the characters that can't attack the
But can be attacked by the hero

Quest
The abstract class of quests
RabbitOfCaerbannog
RabbitOfCaerbannog is a reference to The Holy Grail by Monty Python
It's a cute rabbit, but very dangerous
Should be kill in the first turn, else the hero die
